Subtitles.Static: Roger that, all systems show green. SA-14, you're cleared for departure.
Acknowledged, Freeport 7. We'll see you in about two weeks.
SA-14, we're picking up unknown contacts on long-range sensors. Dispatching a fighter wing to escort you out of the system. Godspeed.
Navy command, this is Freeport 7. We're picking up some strange readings on the long-range sensors.
Alert! Unknown ships have breached the defense perimeter. Man all stations!
Hold on! All right! What is that?

Dynamic.Part: President Jacobi has asked the LSF to investigate the sudden destruction of Freeport 7.
No word yet on whether it was accidental, or a deliberate attack.
The first handful of survivors arrived on Manhattan this morning.
Officially the Liberty Security Force maintains there is no proof Freeport 7's destruction was deliberate...
...but sources inside the LSF say they suspect the dangerous criminal organization, the Order.
We will keep you up to date as the story develops.
We're here from Medical. Is there anyone seriously injured?
One. Inside.
Make sure he lives. He owes me some credits.
Your concern is touching. We'll do everything we can.
It may take a while.

Subtitles.Static: Oh, the only thing I'm looking for right now is this drink.
No. No, I don't think so.
Well, it can't get any worse.
All we have is Liberty Ale, friend.
Her name is Jun'ko Zane. She's a tough one.
She's LSF. All business. If it's a job you want, that is.

Dynamic.Part: On the other hand, if you're looking for something more...

Subtitles.Static: The news. I saw your face on the news.

Dynamic.Part: You're one of the Freeport 7 survivors, aren't you?

Subtitles.Static: I heard it was pretty bad out there.
You know... you're lucky to be alive.
Because it's not every day a man has the chance to start again, huh?
To your good fortune in Liberty, sir!

Dynamic.Part: Juni. The environment has changed.
All with groups like the Order, taking more and more liberties, indeed now threatening our profits.
Some of the government feel that we need to increase our patrols in these areas.
I believe you have business to discuss.

Subtitles.Static: I will leave this matter in your... capable hands.

Dynamic.Part: Ahem.
Sorry. The bartender said you work for the Liberty Security Force.
Trent. I work for myself.

Subtitles.Static: I've got a... friend who was injured in the attack. He's in medical. I'll be staying at least until he is released.

Dynamic.Part: I understand what you're saying, but I don't have nearly enough people!
Wait!
And who do you work for, mister...?

Subtitles.Static: What kind of ship do you have?
Are you staying in Liberty long?
Well as it happens I could use a good freelancer, Mr. Trent.
I'll be in the equipment room later. You can meet me there.
Oh. And if we are going to work together... call me Juni.
It's just Trent. And yeah... I'm here to see what you have to offer.
I'll have to think it over.
I'm pleased to see you. Are you ready to work for the LSF, Mr. Trent?
Well, I've found this ship for you. It's very basic and you won't have jumpaccess yet, but it should be good enough for now.
This assignment will be easy. All you have to do is to baby sit a convoy of food and medical supplies.
You'll be hooking up with the Escort CO, King. I'll tell him to expect you.
That is, of course, if you're interested?
Good. Better get going. I'll have your ship moved immediately.
All you'll have to do is go to the landing pad and "launch".
King will be waiting for you near the docking ring in space. Okay? --I'll see you when you get back.
Fine with me if you want to hang around Manhattan, but I think I'm your best shot at getting a ship.
I'll be here for a while in case you change your mind.
Well, look who it is again. Have you thought it over, Trent?
My offer still stands: Take the mission and the ship is yours.

Dynamic.Part: You must be Trent. I'm King, the CO of this mission. I contacted the lead transport of the convoy. They've completed pre-launch checks and are ready to go.
Should be an easy run from here to Fort Bush and then on to Pittsburgh. Ready?

Subtitles.Static: That's the Donau, Admiral Schultzky's flagship. He's visiting Manhattan to attend a high-level meeting with President Jacobi. Keep your distance.
Yeah! It's good to meet you, King!
Are you gonna tell me what's going on?
Newark Station, this is the RNC Donau. Requesting clearance to dock with your station! Over!
Understood Newark! All escorts, power up weapons!
Fires are out of control! We're losing containment! (noise) Core breach! Ahhhhhhh!
Affirmative, Donau! You are cleared for docking point six. Liberty welcomes you and Admiral Schultzky.
Donau! Be advised, we're picking up unknown contacts. Advise caution!
Unidentified ships, this is Newark Station, you are entering restricted space. Alter course at once or we will open fire!
Newark, do not interfere! We're here to protect the President. Schultzky is a traitor!
Red Alert! The Donau is HIT! Launch all rescue and defensive units! All other fighters, engage enemy ships!
LPU Patrol Beta 2! Cleared for alarm start!
Interceptors are en route. The Colorado and its escort are inbound.
We read you. Radar is clear. SAR: Report. Did you pick up any survivors?
To all utility ships in the area. Scan for survivors! All other vessels, return to normal duty but stay alert.
Damn it! They blew up the Donau! Newark, this is LSF patrol Gamma 6! Engaging enemy!
Trent, we can't let them get away. Engage the enemy!
Trent, there's nothing more we can do here! The transports are waiting at Fort Bush. I've uploaded a waypoint to your Neural Net. Just fly toward it.
I can't believe it! How did they get this close to Manhattan without being detected?

Dynamic.Part: Hey Trent. Having trouble with your controls?
Your HUD is showing the location of the waypoint in several places.
A diamond-shaped icon is showing you the direction of the waypoint.
You could also check the contact list: it's marked there as Mission Waypoint.
Selecting either one will show you direction and distance to the waypoint.
Still having trouble? The easiest way to find where you have to go is by selecting the waypoint.
After you select it, you'll either be facing the waypoint or you won't.
If you see a bigger diamond you're still flying in the wrong direction and you have to turn your ship around.
If you're facing the correct way, you see the target as a blue diamond shape with a distance indicator.
All you have to do is fly toward that point in space.

Subtitles.Static: We've lost enough time here. We've got a job to do and a schedule to keep. Fly to the waypoint, I can't wait forever.
We've lost enough time here. Enter formation, I can't wait forever.
[[sigh] That's it. I'll be sure and tell Juni you're not even worth the heap of junk you're flying. See ya.
First Freeport 7, now this? [sigh] It's getting out of control.
Alright, we've reached the Trade Lane. Engaging activation sequence! Trent, you go first.

Dynamic.Part: Hey, Trent, don't you know how to use a Trade Lane?
You have to select the Trade Lane ring and then use the DOCK maneuver at the top of your HUD.
Your navigation computer will take over from there.

Subtitles.Static: Still having trouble? You have to select the Trade Lane ring and then the DOCK maneuver in your Neural Net.
Activation sequence completed, lane jump initiated.

Dynamic.Part: This is it, Trent. This is one of the major arteries through Manhattan space.
We're only taking it as far as Fort Bush. If we kept going, we'd reach the jump gate to the Colorado system.

Subtitles.Static: Transport leader, this is LSF patrol Gamma 6. We're here to escort you to Pittsburgh. Over.
The planetary defense grid was off-line and the Order managed to break through.
They took out the Donau with their first missile salvo. We never had the chance to stop them.

Dynamic.Part: Looked like the Order was determined to keep Schultzky from meeting the President.
Hard to believe that this could happen. [sigh] We better get going.

Subtitles.Static: Trent, take up a position near the transport. Use the formation maneuver to link up with the convoy.

Dynamic.Part: Hey, Trent, are you having trouble? You have to select the transport and then use the FORMATION maneuver in your Neural Net.
Your navigation computer will automatically get you into a good formation position.

Subtitles.Static: Don't worry, that's why we're here.
Damn! Trent, ready your weapons. This could get rough.
There! Rogues! Trent, break and attack! We got to keep them away until the Trade Lane comes back up.
They got the other transport. We have to get out of here.
Last one! We better get out of here before more of them show up.
We'll cover you. This is going to be close, but I think we can make it without another fight.
Everybody, stay on course. Trent, do not engage the pirates! We have to get the convoy out of here.
Dammit, Trent. Re-enter formation. We can't wait for you.
We're out of here. Trent, use the trade lane to Pittsburgh. Good luck.
We made it! Everybody in one piece?
We made it! I can't believe those damn Rogues cut the other transport. Transport Leader, you guy are still with us?
I can't believe those damn Rogues cut the other transport. Transport Leader, you guy are still with us?
A situation we are soon to fix. The Rogues were better equipped than we expected, but we got what we came for. Thanks for playing the bait.
I'm transferring the payment to your Neural Net account.
Go ahead and land on Pittsburgh. I'll meet you on the surface.
What the hell were you doing? Are you crazy? Those Rogues can be dangerous! Anyway, I'm glad you made it. Land on Pittsburgh. I'll meet you on the surface.

Dynamic.Part: Heeey, here's our conquering hero!
You had me worried Trent, but you did well out there.
One of those Rogues had a bounty on his head. You'll get that as an extra bonus.
All right, land on Pittsburgh. I'll meet you on the surface.

Subtitles.Static: What the hell were you doing? Are you crazy? Those Rogues can be dangerous!
Dammit, Trent. The lead transport is down. That's it. We failed.
You'll find Pittsburgh to be remarkably unexciting, Trent.
All right Trent, let's hit the planet. You go first.
Trent, didn't you hear me? Land on Pittsburgh. Select the docking ring and activate your "Dock" maneuver.
Right after we hit the surface. Why don't you go first? Just select the docking ring and hit "Dock".
Damn it, more pirates! Trent, defend the prison ship at all costs.
Tell them to keep looking. One way or another will find where this Rogues are hiding.
Come on Trent, let's go! We have to start our search pattern.
What are you doing, Trent? We've got to get going. Select one of the isolated ships and use the formation maneuver.

Dynamic.Part: After the attack on our transport, the LSF has dispatched four wings to help us track down where these Rogues are coming from.
They gotta have a secret base around here and this time, we'll find it.

Subtitles.Static: All units, change course to intercept! I'm uploading a waypoint.
This is LSF Patrol Gamma. We're in intercept course and aproaching your position. Over.
There she is ... she's hurt bad. Everyone, break formation and engage.
Yeah! That was the last one!
XT-19, what is your status? Over!
Acknowledged. Is there any way we can assist you?
Epsilon wing, stay here in case more Rogues show up. Trent and I will continue the search on our own.
I'm uploading new coordinates. Trent, take the lead.
The Rogue base is around here, I can feel it. They'd never attack something as big as a prison ship too far away from their hideout.
This is LSF patrol Gamma 6. We hear you, Beta 4. Where are you? Over.
All right Trent, let's take these guys out!
Where's the rest of your wing?
That's it! You must have been close to their base. Can you show us where you were?
Trent, I think this is it. I'm gonna call in for some backup.
To all units, this is Gamma 6. We have a potential location of the Rogue base. Converge on the following coordinates.
The Rogue base must be in the cloud ahead. Trent, take the lead.
There!!! The Rogue Base! To all units, this is Gamma 6. We've confirmed the location of the Rogue base. I'm transmitting new coordinates.
All units: I can make out two defense platforms and an armored depot. We'll need torpedoes to take it out. Over.

Dynamic.Part: Delt ?wing is carrying torpedoes. They're on their way, Trent.
We can't take out the base, their armor is too strong!
But we can soften up their defenses by taking out the platforms. Let's go.

Subtitles.Static: Trent look out, more pirate ships closing in fast! I hope those reinforcements get here soon.
Second platform is down. Where are these torpedo bombers?!
Trent, ignore the base. Their armor is too strong.
Good to see you guys, let's finish them off!
That was the last of them.
Engage the remaining fighters, Trent! We can't let them get away!
Good work, Trent. Let's get clear. I'm uploading coordiantes to Pittsburgh in your Neural Net. Let's go.
Good work back there, Trent. Not bad for a rookie!
Something tells me I'm going to be seeing a lot more of you in the future.

Dynamic.Part: Our work today will hopefully put a dent in the growing crime problem we've been having in this system.
Maybe now we can focus our full attention on The Order and anyone who supports them.
That business with Schultzky that can't go unpunished!
Trent, Juni just sent me a message on the Secure Channel. Change of plans. I need to divert.
Look, if you land on Pittsburgh, talk to one of the Deep Space reps. They'll have something lined up for you.
Meanwhile, I'm transferring your payment now. Thanks for your help. See you around.
President Jacobi has ordered a full investigation to determine what can be done about The Order. It'll likely mean more work for us soon.
Meanwhile, why don't you spread your wings a bit and familiarize yourself with the New York system, maybe see what work you can pick up. I'll be in touch. Juni out!
Trent, this is Juni! Good job. King just told me how impressed he was with you.
I hope this wasn't too much for your first assignment. I wanted to meet up with you, but the attack on Schultzky has everyone rattled.

Subtitles.Static: Mayday! Mayday! This is Prison Ship XT-19, we're under attack. To all Liberty patrols, please respond!
We can't take any more of this!
You did it! The radar is clear.
Alert! We're picking up several new hostile contacts.
We're taking heavy damage. Get these guys off us!
Acknowledged, Gamma 6! We're under attack by multiple Rogue fighters! We have fires on several decks and our defences are failing.
Fires are contained. We lost life support to several decks, but we're all right. Over.
Negative. Repair crews from Pittsburgh are on the way. You came just in time.
Roger, Gamma 6, this is the USV Brandt. Pre-launch checks have been completed.
We heard the news about Schultzky. What happened?
Check. This is Transport Leader, all ships are in position and we show green status.
Let's hope for the best. Several convoys have come under attack in recent weeks. The Rogue problem has got out of control in this area.
Activation sequence completed. Lane jump initiated.
Transport 2 is down. We've got to get out of here!

Dynamic.Part: Couldn't agree more! The trade lane is back up. Let's– Wait!
Radar shows new targets! Gamma 6, we have to make a run for it!

Subtitles.Static: Barely. That was close! Thanks for getting us here in one piece, Gamma 6. We almost didn't make it.
Now it's your turn to reel them in, King. We're gonna unload our cargo. Remember our bargain.
Gamma 6, Delta patrol reports no hostile contacts.
This is Alpha 1. Acknowledged. We'll rendezvous at the coordinates. Over.
Gamma 6, this is LSF Alpha 1. What's your status?
Gamma 6, we've got it from here. All units: secure the area.
Mayday! This is LSF Beta 4. I'm under attack and need assistance!
Gone! We were sweeping through the debris field and ran into a heavy fire inside a dense particle cloud.
My systems are fried and I have a coolant leak. I'm headed back to Pittsburgh.
The ship is holding together – barely!
I have several Rogue ships on my tail– [static] I can't shake them! My shields are failing!
I'm near the edge of the debris field. I– [static]
This is Delta 1 Leader. We're on the far side of Pittsburgh. Changing course to your location. Over.
This is LSF Delta 1. We're making our torpedo run at the station. Over.
The Order will pay for this. Escort wing: Fire at will.
That was the last one, Newark.
Negative, Newark. We're continuing our sweep.
Newark. Sweep is complete. No survivors detected. Over.
Hey, King, did you know it was going to get hot out there?

Dynamic.Part: What others?
All right. But this better be worth it!

Subtitles.Static: You'll find Pittsburgh to be remarkably unexciting, Trent.
That's the mining operation – not much to look at – a lot of rocks, smoke and fire. But what it lacks in class it more than makes up for in cheap drinks.
Set your ship down on one of the landing pads over there.
Nice job, Trent. Now I believe I owe you some credits.
Uh huh. We're not done yet. We're just waiting for the others.
We've suspected for some time now that The Order has had ties to organised crime in Liberty.
They may even be hiding a secret base. I think we're on to something here and I've called for backup.

Dynamic.Part: We could really use you out there, Trent.

Subtitles.Static: It will be. I promise you.

Dynamic.Part: Now that you have a little scratch, I'd look into outfitting that pile of junk you're flying.

Subtitles.Static: Try the Equipment Dealer over there, he always has good deals.

Dynamic.Part: There you are! Four LSF wings from Fort Bush are searching the debris field for the Rogue base.
They've already taken prisoners.
I'm uploading the coordinates for our search pattern. We'll rendezvous with another wing of fighters for our patrol.
Hold on, there they are.

Subtitles.Static: Our pleasure, Gamma 6! We couldn't have done it without you.
Good to see you again, Trent.
Alien. They're very old and fetch a huge price among collectors as high art.
Liberty purposely monitors and restricts their trade,
but the LSF is about to ban them altogether under orders of the President.
Wait, tell him about the bonus.
Trent, I've got a pit stop to make.
Well, now that we're all here... The LSF has an important mission for you. Are you interested?
All right, here are the details. The LSF has got a line on a smuggler who's been moving artefacts in and out of Liberty space–
Okay. This smuggler's name is Sean Ashcroft. He's been under investigation for a while.
Now we have information that he's going to try to move a shipment into New York through the Colorado gate. We want him!
Your job is to stop the convoy before it reaches New York and bring him in for interrogation.
Now, he's probably got help, so be careful.
I'm uploading the access code to the Colorado gate into your Neural Net now.
I'll also have a scanner and tractor beam installed in your ship.
I've got the access codes to the rest of the Liberty gates. You can have them, once you deliver Ashcroft.
I don't think I'm ready for this one.
We can wait for you, Trent, but not for long.
I want you on this mission, but only if you can deliver.

Dynamic.Part: Lonnigan, is that you?
When did they release you from Medical?
You think you're safe! But you're not!
What are you talking about?
What do you think happened on Freeport 7? Hm?
It was blown to dust. Like my ship, my ore shipment, and my million credits that, by the way, you still owe me.
Easy come, easy go.
No! No, no, no, no. We had a deal.
A deal that died with the station.
All seems so long ago now...
Doesn't matter, anyway. They want us all dead.
Who wants us all dead?
Men... Government men...
They'll find the manifest, they'll know who was there!
They're already after me!
But I'm smart.
I escaped from Medical.
Wait, you what? You escaped?
I had to! They came for me, Trent!
Because of what I saw! On the station!
I saw what did this to us! To me!
There were these ships... but...
They weren't there, they weren't...
Lonnigan, you're not making sense!
You don't understand!
They know me now, I'm not safe here anymore, none of us are!
Trent, we've got to get out of Manhattan. I-
Hey, wait! Lonnigan!
Hey, what do you think you're-
Hey.
Hey.
Hey, wake up! [slap]
Whoa. You look terrible.
Are you all right?
I... I don't know.
What happened to you?
Two men. They jumped me.
Oh...! My chest...!
Where's Lonnigan?
Lonnigan? Who's Lonnigan?
They must have taken him!
Trent! Pull yourself together! Remember Ashcroft, and the mission.
Yeah...
He'll be fine! Come on Trent, we've got work to go.
Are you sure you're up for this?
I'll be fine.
Then I'll see you when you get back. Good hunting!

Subtitles.Static: There you are! I was starting to wonder if you were really okay. You are okay, aren't you?
Good. So, what was going on down there? Who's Lonnigan?
Hold on, we're almost at the trade lane.
Our flight path takes us right past Fort Bush and straight on to the Colorado gate. You first, Trent.
I met him on Freeport 7. We just signed a deal when the station was attacked. He was injured and has been in Medical ever since.
I've been waiting for him to recover to get my money back.
Nothing about the money! He said he escaped from Medical and that people were after him.
I thought he'd lost it, but then these two guys appeared and shot him. Maybe he wasn't just paranoid. Ah, I'm never getting paid! Goodbye million credits.
Are you sure you brought enough men? He's unconscious in my cargo hold.
What's gonna to happen to Ashcroft?
Trent, Ashcroft is a dangerous man. And I don't like to take unnecessary risks.
Which reminds me: the bounty, and I owe you the access codes.
They're both being uploaded to your Neural Net now. You'll also find an extra bonus.
He'll be interrogated, of course. He's our best insight into the smuggling ring. I'm sure we can make him talk.
Meanwhile, with your new security status I suspect you'll be able to occupy your time while I'm gone.
On assignment. I take orders, too, Trent.
But don't go too far, I might need you again – soon.
Cease fire or you will be destroyed!
Sean Ashcroft, you are under arrest.
Got him! I'm going in! Follow me.
You are in violation of the Liberty artefact code and are under arrest. Cut your engines!
All right! All right, already! Are you crazy?
I hope you got good lawyers. This is abuse of power, here. I'll sue!
I'm not Ashcroft, you jar-head. Now I'm really going to have your butt.
The name is Van Nostrom. Remember it! I'm about to be your worst nightmare, flatfoot. This is wrongful arrest, harassment and wanton destruction of my property.
This is outrageous! You haven't heard the last of this! I– [coughs]
Are you having trouble? Select the Trade Lane and use the DOCK maneuver in your Neural Net. Your navigation computer will do the rest.
We've lost enough time here. We've got a job to do and a schedule to keep. Take the Trade Lane.
That's it. I'll be sure and tell Juni you weren't serious about bringing in Ashcroft. See ya!
Activation sequence completed. Lane jump initiated.
It's only a short run from here to the Colorado gate. Let's go.

Dynamic.Part: Activation sequence completed. Lane jump initiated. Ever since the attack on Schultzky, the Navy has moved heavy battleships to all jump-gates.
Every ship going in or out of the New York system is being scanned.

Subtitles.Static: Unity, this is Patrol Gamma 6 on special LSF assignment. Requesting permission to jump to Colorado. Over.
Roger that. Gamma 6 out. That wasn't too bad. Let's go!
Good. Next stop: the Colorado System.
System jump successful! All systems show green. Trent, take up position near the trade lane.
Acknowledged. Trent, we have to scan every ship that's coming through. Fly tot?he waypoint and take up position.
Hey, Trent, we have to get into position! Fly to the waypoint near the Trade Lane.
Good. Cut your engines. We'll wait here.
There! A convoy! Target the ships and scan their cargo.
This could get rough, ready your weapons.
This is Patrol Gamma 6. Engaging enemy!
Yeah! Last one! Pueblo, what's your status?
Yes, we are, strong and clear. Thank you, Pueblo. They will pay for this.
Ashcroft is ours. Trent! Head for the coordinates.
We're on his tail. Pueblo managed to tag one of Ashcroft's ships – we're following the signal into the Silverton field. We could use some help.
There they are! Ashcroft and his thugs! This must be the drop-off point for the artefacts.
This is LSF Gamma 6. We found Ashcroft! Need immediate back-up. Lock on to my signal. Over.
We're going in, Trent. Stay sharp!
Trent, break and attack. Try to get Ashcroft alive if you can.
Ignore the transports, Trent. We have to take out the fighters.
All units, I found Ashcroft. He's fleeing into the field, I've tagged him. Trent, we can't let him get away. Come on!
Damn it! Ashcroft's making a run for it! He's activated his cruise engines!
Damn! The disruptor missile missed Ashcroft. He's entered cruise speed.
We have to hurry before he can get away. Activate your cruise engines and head for the coordinates!
I'm picking up a disturbance – could be a jump-hole. We have to hurry or he's gonna get away!
Roger that! I'm seeing the same thing. Everybody, get ready!
Good to see you, Zeta 1. We're looking for a criminal named Ashcroft. We need him alive.
He's ejected! Trent, use your tractor beam to bring him in.
Come on, Trent. We have to get going. Pick up the life pod with you tractor beam.
Don't you know how to use a tractor beam? Select Ashcroft's life pod and use select the tractor beam in the target window on the left side of your HUD. Come on, we have to get this thug to Juni.
Zeta 1, we're taking Ashcroft back to New York for interrogation. Thanks for your help!
Good job, Trent. Ashcroft's on ice and Juni's waiting for us in New York. I'm uploading a waypoint to the gate. Let's get going.
Come on, Trent. We have to go. Fly toward the waypoint. Juni is waiting.
We need to get out of here before more of Ashcroft's friends show up. Fly toward the Colorado Gate.
I hope Ashcroft's interrogation will shed some light on the illegal artefact trade here in Liberty. Pressure from high up has been mounting in the last few weeks.
Rumour has it that about a month ago, a Rheinland expedition discovered a whole new supply of these things on a distant planet in the Omicron systems.

Dynamic.Part: I mean, everybody knows that there are alien ruins,
but they're mostly dust and the artefacts are just as dead as the beings who made them.
Apparently, these new ones are different,
they're active and could be dangerous.

Subtitles.Static: Both LSF and the Liberty Navy have stepped up their patrols and I've heard rumours within the LSF that the President will soon be banning these artefacts altogether.
We're fine. Mission accomplished. We broke up Ashcroft's little party. He was getting ready to move those artefacts on to the black market when we took him down.
Negative. Trent has him tied up in his cargo hold. He deserves worse.
Come on, Trent. We've lost enough time already. Take the Jumpgate and use your DOCK maneuver.
Activation sequence completed. System jump initiated.
Lane jump successful. All systems show green.
This is Patrol Gamma 6 on special assignment. We have a prisoner for the LSF. Requesting permission to proceed. Over.
Thank you, Unity. Out! Juni must have arranged that for us. Let's go.
The Missouri... she's full of surprises. Usually, the Navy draws the line at Zone-21. They must really want to get their hands on Ashcroft.
We're almost there, one more trade lane.
Damn it! Intel was right. More Rogues! Trent, we have to fight them off. Fort Bush, this is LSF Gamma 6! We're under attack and need assistance. Over.
Last one! That was close! Thank you Alpha wing!
For the Rogues to attack us so close to Fort Bush... Ashcroft must really know something important.
This is Patrol Gamma 6 on special LSF assignment. We're bringing a prisoner to LSF Commander Jun'ko Zane. Over.
Roger that. Gamma 6 out. Time to collect your credits, Trent.
Hold on... Yeah, I understand. Yes, I'm leaving right now. Over. Hey Trent, a convoy near Pittsburgh is in trouble and needs help. I'll see you later.
Give Juni my best. You have clearance, dock with the battleship. Juni is waiting. You did a great job out there, Trent. See ya!
Trent! This is Juni. I have a new assignment for you, if you're interested. Meet me on Manhattan. King and I will be waiting for you in the bar.
This is Juni. Ashcroft has been sighted in the Kepler System. We don't know which way he's going, but it looks like he's coming straight at you. Keep your eyes open. Over.
King, Ashcroft's convoy just entered Colorado. We've set up a trap for him at Pueblo Station. Stay where you are and make sure that none of his men get away. Over.
King! Our plan has failed! Ashcroft broke through our forces at Pueblo. We've lost contact with the station. Get there as fast as you can. Hurry!
King, what is going on? Where's Ashcroft?
Understood! I'm ordering the Rio Grande to send several fighter wings. Don't do anything foolish, King – wait for the support. Juni out!
This is Juni. King, are you and Trent all right? What is your status? Over.
You didn't kill him, did you? I remember the last time–
He'll get what he deserves, but not until he's told us all we need to know. I'll make preparations for your arrival.

Dynamic.Part: Be careful heading back to New York. Intel advises that members of Ashcroft's gang might try to free him before we get him into lockdown.
I'm still on Manhattan. Meet me there. Juni out!

Subtitles.Static: This is Juni. Change of plans. You and Trent are to proceed directly to the Battleship Missouri near Zone-21. I'll take charge of Ashcroft there. Juni out.
This is Battleship Missouri Control. Identify yourself. Over.
Acknowledged. Commander Zane is awaiting you. Over.
This is Jump-Gate Control on the Battleship Unity. Please identify yourselves. Over.
Patrol Gamma 6. You're clear to proceed. Over.
Acknowledged, Gamma 6. You've received priority clearance. Over.
You'll be sorry you ever met me!
Gamma 6. This is Navy Patrol, Zeta 1. Proceeding to your location. Over.
I'm picking something up on my scanners.
Gamma 6, this is Patrol Zeta 1. Ready to engage!
Acknowledged. This is Zeta leader. Engage Rogue fighters.
Mayday! Mayday! This is Pueblo Station. We're under attack! Repeat: we're under attack!
Gamma 6, we're tracking six hostiles! We have fires on several decks and life support is failing. We can't take much more!
We're taking heavy damage. Get these guys off us!
The station is falling apart, hurry!
We lost life support to several sections, but we're all right.

Dynamic.Part: We set up a trap for a guy named Ashcroft. But his convoy didn't come out of the trade lane as we thought – they came from the Copperton field and totally surprised us.
The LSF fighters were taken down like flies!

Subtitles.Static: When the fighting started, they took off into the Silverton field. We tagged one of them with a tracking device – uploading now. Are you getting the signal?
This is Fort Bush. We're launching two wings to assist you.
Fort Bush Wing Alpha here. Engaging enemy!

Dynamic.Part: Lonnigan, where have you...?
Yeah, The Order.
Look, let's just talk about this.
What the...?
Don't move. Just listen!
Stay still! I had to kill a man to escape today. What's one more–?
Why are you still here? Don't you see what's going on?
Freeport 7? Zone 21?
No! It's not just them. It's Liberty: the artefacts, they're after something.
No more talking! I know what I'm doing now. I have a plan.
I wanted to warn you, I felt I owed it to you.
Don't try to follow me, Trent. Get out of Liberty while you still can!

Subtitles.Static: Interesting. I'm looking for Jun'ko Zane. Have you seen her lately?
No, thanks, I'd better get going.
Nice to see you again! How are things?
Yeah, she asked me to tell you to meet her on the terraforming station on California Minor.
No. That was all. Drink, Mr Trent?
Mr Trent! We need to talk.
I was with you on Freeport 7 – we met on the rescue ship.
Something's going on. I'm being followed. Other survivors from Freeport have been disappearing. Please meet me on Los Angeles.
Brandon Rowlett, you are under arrest. Cut your engines and stand down!
Civilian ship, this was a classified Navy operation. Do yourself a favour and keep this quiet.
You fool. You're gonna pay for this.
You know if you'd wanted to see me you could have picked a quieter place.
Well, this is low, I'll give you that.
Well, I flew all the way out here, didn't I?
Nice. So when do I leave?

Dynamic.Part: Shhh!

Subtitles.Static: I'm trying to keep a low profile.
The reason I called you here, Trent, apart from your glittering social commentary, is to have you do a job.
Ashcroft's interrogation has given us a whole new perspective on the inner workings of the artefact smuggling ring.
Apparently, there's someone working on the inside in Liberty. We don't know who yet.
We think in the Navy – maybe even an officer.

Dynamic.Part: My CO has ordered a priority operation to expose this traitor.

Subtitles.Static: And since I need a complete outsider for this, I thought of you.

Dynamic.Part: When do we leave. We're working together on this one.

Subtitles.Static: Thanks, but no thanks. I'm not really all that interested right now.
Do you still have a job for me?

Dynamic.Part: Well, I'm sorry I wasted your valuable time, Trent.
Meanwhile, if you actually want to talk business, look me up. I may still be here.

Subtitles.Static: I met him on Freeport 7. He was a tradesman, or at least I thought he was.
It wasn't before, it was during. He almost died. Doesn't make sense.
He wasn't smart enough to be a terrorist, let alone lead them.
He was trying to tell me something...
He must have been doing recon before the attack.
Well, whoever he was, he's dead now. C'mon, Trent, we've got another scumbag to ferret out.

Dynamic.Part: ...the LSF says it has now seriously crippled The Order by bringing down their top man.
Again: The LSF reports that the actual leader of The Order, previously known only by his code-name, Orillion, was shot and killed while trying to escape from Liberty into Rheinland space.
In addition, Liberty officials have also just released his real name...
Sam Lonnigan.
For those just joining us: Sam Lonnigan, also known as Orillion, leader of the terrorist group, The Order, was apprehended today at the Liberty border.
We are told by the LSF that there was every intention to take him alive, but Lonnigan rushed agents and engaged them in a bloody shoot-out.
He died at the scene. His remains are in Liberty custody and under guard, pending autopsy.
Hold on. Radar shows several ships on an intercept course. Wow! What are Rheinland Valkyries doing here?

Subtitles.Static: Attention Rheinland vessels. This is Commander Zane of the Liberty Security Force. Please identify yourselves. Over.

Dynamic.Part: Rheinland vessels, please respond. Trent, stay alert, something's wrong here.

Subtitles.Static: This place is starting to feel like home...
Thanks, but no thanks. Causes come and go. I think I'd rather just keep freelancing, if it's all the same to you.

Dynamic.Part: Trent, meet Marcus Walker. He's the captain of a Liberty cruiser.
He's just agreed to help us.

Subtitles.Static: Don't get too comfortable, we still have lots to do.
Always happy to help out the LSF! I've known Jun'ko for years.
Sorry to hear about your luck on Freeport 7. You were fortunate to get out alive.
Seems nowadays, if it isn't smugglers, it's The Order or some other scum trying to take advantage of us.
Piracy is running rampant. Ah, you know, Trent...
the Liberty military is always looking for good pilots to join them full-time. It's a worthy cause.
Suit yourself. Uh, now, if you'll excuse me, I need to make preparations.

Dynamic.Part: Nice, meeting you, Trent. I'll see you at the rendezvous.

Subtitles.Static: After you called me from Willard, I started to ask around a bit. I confirmed that your CO is in prison. There's been a major shake-up in the higher ranks of the LSF.
Okay, I'll try to find out what's going on. Talk to you soon.

There you are. I'm switching to a private ca?nnel. Juni, I just received new orders from High Command. My group has been ordered back to space dock for an inspection. We're supposed to depart in half an hour.
They claim that there are inconsistencies in our maintenance records. Not sure why: we had complete work-up only two months ago.
Forget about space dock. All ships go to battle stations! Set course for Station Willard.
Station Willard, this is Liberty Cruiser Attack Group South, Captain Walker speaking. We're en route to your location and will be in range within a few minutes. What is your status? Over.
Understood Willard! Try to hold them back until we get there.
Willard, this is Attack Group South. We're entering the asteroid field and will be at your location shortly.
All fighter wings: engage the enemy. Cruisers! Break formation and protect Willard Station.
These gunboats are too fast for our turrets. Fighters, concentrate your fire on them!
I'm reading several Rheinland bombers! All fighters, intercept the bombers before they can launch their torpedoes.
We did it! All the gunboats are out of it!
Jun'ko, I will have to stay here and deploy repair teams. Why don't you join me in the station and we can discuss what's going on with the LSF and the Navy?
Trent! This is Juni. I'm back from assignment and have a job for you. Meet me on Manhattan. I'll fill you in on the details when you get here.
Trent, I'm sorry I couldn't meet you as planned. I'm on assignment in California.
I can't tell you specifics right now. Let's just say Ashcroft provided us with the information we hoped for. Meet me on California Minor as soon as you can.
Finish your business as quickly as possible and get here as soon as you can.
I need you on this one, Trent. I'll be waiting for you.
Trent, I have you on my scanners. Glad you're here. You're just in time.
Just land and I'll tell you everything you need to know. I'll wait for you in the bar. Juni out.
There you are! I'm switching to a secure channel. Time to find out if there really is a traitor behind the artefact smuggling. We'll take the trade lane to San Diego. You first, Trent. Let's go.
Are you having trouble? Select the trade line and use the dock maneauver in your Neural Net. Your navigation computer will do the rest.
We've lost enough time here. The convoy is not gonna wait for us, Trent. We have to go.
That's it. You should just have told me that you're not interested in this mission. See you.

Dynamic.Part: The LSF took out a criminal hideout in Magellan based on information I got out of Ashcroft.
We found hundreds of artefacts. The convoy we're escorting is bringing them to the LSF Research Lab here in California.

Subtitles.Static: The existence of the convoy has been kept secret and only a selected few know about its cargo and destination.
If Ashcroft is telling the truth and there really is a traitor working inside the Liberty Military or the LSF, this will lure him out. It's simply too good to pass up.
LSF Commander Jun'ko Zane. We're here on special assignment to escort a convoy to Research Station Willard.
Got it! Thank you, San Diego. Trent, we've got to hurry. Let's go.
Hey, Trent. We have to get to the transports. If there is an attack it'll be inside the Barrera passage. Let's go.
Come on. We have to get to the transports. Fly to the waypoint and take a position. Hurry.
Transport HX-17. This is Commander Zane. Sorry we're late. What's your status?
Transport Leader, proceed to the first buoy.
Continue to the next buoy and keep your eyes open.
Proceed to the third. There's an opening in the passage and an abandoned supply depot coming up. Keep your eyes open.
I read them, Transport Leader. San Diego, we are under attack. Repeat, we are under attack and need assistance. Over.
Damn it, Trent! The lead transport is down. That's it. We've failed.
Gamma 1! We need your help! Engage the enemies.
We've got to get out of here. Transport Leader, proceed to the next buoy on the other side of this zone.
Gamma Wing: take flanking positions! We're not too far away from Willard.
This is the last section of the Barrera Passage. Willard Station is very close.
This is LSF Commander Zane, we're escorting a supply of classified materials to Willard Station.
I'm glad you showed up, Gamma 1. It was starting to look grim.
Thanks again. Trent, I have to land on the station and contact a few people. It's pretty obvious now that there's a mole in the Navy. I'll see you soon.
Oh, I recommend you land and repair your ship. We'll meet back in space in a few minutes.
Oh, I recommend you land and get yourself some equipment. We'll meet back in space in a few minutes.
Trent, we have to fly back to California Minor, we'll take a short-cut this time. I'm uploading the coordinates. Let's go!

Dynamic.Part: Switching to a secure channel... Something's terribly wrong. I wanted to brief my CO on what happened with the convoy, but he's been ordered to Manhattan.
My contacts tell me that he's actually been placed under arrest – for treason.
I tried to find out more, but all my friends at LSF Headquarters seemed to have disappeared. The only person I was able to contact was King, who's still on Pittsburgh.

Subtitles.Static: What's going on? Rheinland military ships in the middle of Liberty? Why did they attack us?
Do you think this had anything had to do with the artefacts? I just don't get it... Rheinland? Even if there's a traitor in the Liberty Military, what do Rheinlanders have to do with anything?
We have to get to California Minor and talk to Walker.
He's the captain of a Liberty Navy cruiser stationed here in California. He and I worked together on several operations in the past. I know we can trust him.
All right, Trent. I'm going to find Walker. Meet me in the bar in a few minutes.
Walker and his cruisers are standing by on the far side of the planet. Let's go.
That's only the tip of the iceberg. We were just attacked by Rheinland Valkyries...
King, we're almost at our rendezvous point. I'll contact you once we're on Willard Station.
Acknowledged! Trent, watch yourself! This is going to get rough.
Dear, God! We've lost the Utah. I'm so sorry Walker.
The Rheinlanders took out one of the cruisers!
Okay. Trent, this will take some time and you've gone beyond the call of duty already. I'm transferring your payment now.
Perhaps I deduct some of your payment since we failed to protect the cruisers.
I recommend that you take on a few jobs in the meantime. Once I know more, I'll contact you again. Right now, I need to find out what's going on.
All of the hostiles are destroyed.
Commander Zane, this is Gamma 1 from San Diego.
We got here as soon as we could.
All systems are green. We're ready to enter the passage.
We've reached the entrance to the pathway, Commander.
Commander, we've reached the first buoy.
Proximity alert! Scanner is picking up something!
Alert! I have multiple inbound contacts coming in from all around us. They're everywhere!
Transport 2 is in trouble. Keep the fighters away from the transport!
Dammit! Transport 2 is down. We have to get out of here!
This is HX-17. We're taking heavy damage.
Coolant leak! Our engine core is damaged. Get these guys off us!
Incoming ships, this is Willard Station. Identify yourself.
Understood! We've been expecting you. Proceed to the station. Docking ports are currently off-line. We'll have it fixed in a moment.
Commander Zane, you are now cleared to land. Docking ports 2 and 3 are ready for you.
This is Research Station Willard. We're under attack and are taking heavy damage. We won't be able to hold out much longer. Repeat, this is Station Willard, we're under attack.

Dynamic.Part: We're being attacked by Rheinland gunboats and a wing of attack fighters.
Several torpedoes have hit the Harmony and the station is on fire. Automatic defenses are failing and our fighters are being shot down like flies.

Subtitles.Static: Acknowledged! Two more torpedoes have hit the station! We've got plasma leaks in multiple sections! Hurry!
This is Liberty Border Station San Diego. Please identify yourself.
Acknowledged, Commander. The convoy has already left and is waiting at the Barrera passage. Hold on, we're uploading a waypoint to your Neural Net.

Dynamic.Part: Juni, what's going on?
Over here.
Hey, what's wrong?
Nothing! Something! I don't know yet.
What do you mean?
Ashcroft's missing.
He was on a Liberty dreadnought, in a maximum security cell, surrounded by armed guards!
Trent, you don't escape from that. After our last assignment, I had a few more questions for him about his Rheinland connection, when I got there, he was gone.
Who would transfer him without telling you?
He wasn't transferred. Every record of him ever being arrested was wiped clean. Even the guards were changed. They say they never even heard of Sean Ashcroft.
What do you think is going on?
I– I don't know! But... there's more: Walker. He's gone, too.
Walker's gone? But he's the captain of a Naval cruiser. Ship captains just don't go missing without someone noticing.
Neither do their ships. It's listed as lost – five years ago.
Five years ago! That's impossible!
People around us are disappearing, Trent.
Well, we're here. What's our move?
We have to find out what's going on. The last place Walker's ship was stationed was California, somebody must have seen him. That's where we'll start. Are you with me?
When do we leave?
In a few minutes. I need to finish up some business inside first.
Watch yourself!
Keep an eye on our ships, all right?
Mr Trent. It's very important that you and I speak.
And why is that?
Because we're the last two.
Last two what?
Freeport 7 survivors, Mr Trent! You and I are the last ones in Liberty. Everyone else is either dead or missing.
Wait, I know you. From the rescue ship! What happened out there?
They were looking for something. I'm a thief, Mr Trent. I came to Freeport 7 to deliver something that a certain party wanted very badly. Apparently, they weren't alone.
You telling me this is all because of you?
It's not really about me, Mr Trent... it's about this. This is what they're after. And now they're after us. We need to get as far away from here as possible...
Hold it right there! Get your hands up!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! I can explain!
I have my orders. All artefact smugglers are considered enemies of the state and are to be shot on sight.
Freeze, soldier! I am an agent with the Liberty Security Force! This man is a Freelancer who is working with me on assignment.
I found him dealing in illegal artefacts–
Then arrest him.
What?
I'm afraid I can't do that.
Soldier, you are bound by Liberty Code to uphold the law. You don't have a choice. If he's a suspect, take him into custody. The law protects him and ensures a fair trial.
Not any more.
Ugh!
He was gonna kill me!
What do you mean "arrest him"?
He was going to kill us both!
Who was that?
I don't know. But he had the right idea. Liberty isn't safe for us right now. We've got to leave.
Trent, no! What about Walker?
We won't be any good to Walker if we're dead. Do you see this man? I don't think he's alone. Juni, we need to stick together and we need some time and distance to sort this out.
I know a place. Follow me...
I'd like to, but I can't right now.
Trent, I really need your help.
I just need some more time.
And how much time do you think we have left?
Enough. I'll be back. Wait for me here.
What the hell took you so long?
Haven't heard anything from Walker yet.
Hopefully someone in California knows something. You're ready?

Subtitles.Static: First to Fort Bush and then from there to the Badlands. If they find the bodies on the landing pad, the Navy will lock down all trade lanes. We have to hurry!
This is the Liberty Navy! Cut your engines and prepare to be taken into custody.
If you don't mind my asking: what are you doing this far out?
I think it has something to do with this.
Freeport 7 was destroyed for it. The man who had it was killed in front of me. We were almost next.
We can't get rid of it now. There's a reason all of this is happening and we're in the middle of it.
At least, if we keep it we have a bargaining chip.
We just need to lay low for a while.
I don't understand. Help us what?
I don't want to identify it, I want to get rid of it!

Dynamic.Part: I... don't know...

Subtitles.Static: Juni! Oh! I'm glad you made it. The secure channel is buzzing with reports about you.
Van Pelt's my name, young man. Welcome!
Oh well, you've come to the right place.
The only visitor I get is a supply ship once a month.
Studying the anomalies in the Badlands. This station you see around you was part of a–
a grand experiment to fuel Liberty's waning resources.
That was long before the Gas Mining Guild, of course.
Nor would you. There was an accident here.
Liberty doesn't like to publicise its failures. It was abandoned...
Except for the machines! I like it that way. Not a lot of distractions.
Juni, what is this all about?
Clearly an artefact, but I've never seen anything like it.
It's very ancient... rarified... Nadnium crystal setting...

Dynamic.Part: still active! Hmm. You might try Quintaine.

Subtitles.Static: Not what, dear, who: Professor Roland Quintaine, of Cambridge.
I can't help you with this, but he might. He's a respected Xeno-Archeologist.
Ah, I'm afraid your young man is right, my dear.
Don't worry. You'll both be safe in Bretonia.
Now, how to get you there...
Long range scan shows a Liberty patrol. They must have followed you somehow, they never come out this far.
I'm setting the automatic defence systems to cover you. Take the back way.
One of the things that was left behind here was a jump-gate to Magellan.
No-one has used it since the disaster, but it still works.
It's deep in the Badlands. I'm loading the coordinates for you now.

Dynamic.Part: You must go! Now!

Subtitles.Static: To all Liberty Bounty Hunters and Peacekeeping Forces: be advised there is a bounty for two suspects wanted for questioning. Sending identity data now.
They are armed and extremely dangerous. End transmission.
Juni, the patrol is getting closer. The interference from the anomaly will only hide you for so long. Quick, head into the Badlands!
Liberty Patrol, this is Benford station. These people are here under my authority!
Juni! [static] out of here! There's [static] –thing you can do. Save yourselves! I will– [static]
Unidentified craft: stay right where you are!
You are in violation of Liberty Security Code and are subject to immediate termination.
Negative, Benford! Target renegade ships, on my signal!
Leeds! My friend Tobias runs the Equipment Dealership there.
Trent! This is Juni. Something is going on. I need your help. Meet me on Manhattan.
Damn! They've blocked the Fort Bush trade lane? Come on, we've got to get out of here now!
We have to get to West Point, it's the only way out!
They're bringing in more and more ships. We gotta get out of here.
We can't stay here. Let's go!
The Unity is blocking the entrance! We're surrounded!
Trent, I don't think we can get out of this.
I'm picking up additional hostiles coming in from Manhattan. There's just too many of them – I'm sorry...
We have to get to the Badlands! There's a place where we can hide.
Here they come! Several wings of Navy fighters!
Understood. Quickly, Trent! We're got to get to the Badlands. You take point.
We made it! The Badlands will shield us from their scanners. I don't think the Navy will follow us in here.
Thanks for getting us out of there. It started to look grim!
Trent, I've uploaded new coordinates. You're going to meet a friend of mine. Take point.
Doctor Van Pelt. This is Jun'ko – Jun'ko Zane!
Too long to explain! We need a place to hide.
No! C'mon Trent, we've got to help him.
Doctor, you've got to come with us. We're coming in to pick you up.
All right, Trent, we have to get out of here. Head to the coordinates. Quickly!
We've got to make it to the jump-gate.
According to Van Pelt's data, we should be close to the jump-gate.
Thanks God, it's still working. Let's go!
I've disabled the gate, but we can't sit still. We have to keep moving.
The only station around here is Freeport 4. We'll stop there for repairs and try to work out what's going on. Come on!
I have multiple signals on an approach vector. Prepare to engage!
Trent, there's a bounty on our head. They'll never let us out of here alive. We have to fight!
Trent! Where are you going? Stay here and fight!
Thank you. But... why are you helping us?
Understood! Trent, repair your ship and buy whatever equipment you need. I'll see you shortly.
Well, I've got good and bad news. The good news is that there are jump-holes nearby that lead to Manchester and Leeds.

Dynamic.Part: The bad news is that Liberty has dramatically stepped up their policies against illegal artefacts.
Rumours speak of hundreds of arrests, and there's a reward on our heads: 1 million credits. Can you believe it?
The artefact is the key. We have to find out what it is and why they want it so badly.

Subtitles.Static: Rheinlanders again! They're here for the artefact. Trent, engage!

Dynamic.Part: It's best if we split up. With that price on our heads, every bounty hunter in the colonies is gonna be after us.
I'll go to Cambridge to find Professor Quintaine. Trent, find to your friend on Leeds and stay out of sight. I'm uploading the coordinates of the Leeds jump-hole.

Subtitles.Static: I'll contact you when I reach Cambridge. Good luck and be careful!

Dynamic.Part: Trent, this is Juni. I'm on New London. King just contacted me. He's with Walker.
He said the Navy has been placed on heightened alert. Jacobi has classified all artefacts as illegal.
And congratulations... you and I are now Liberty's most wanted criminals. Take on a few jobs and try to get a new ship. I'll contact you when I find Quintaine. Juni out.
Trent! This is Juni. I've made it to Cambridge. No luck so far finding the Professor. I'll contact you when I hear anything.
Until then, keep a low profile. Every bounty hunter in the colonies is probably looking for us.

Subtitles.Static: Juni, this is King. Proceed to West Point.
This is gonna get rough. West Point will be alerted that we're coming. What's the plan?
Understood! Lambda 4 and Lambda 5: take flanking positions. We're heading straight for the old trade lane to Ithaca station.
Hostile fighters detected. They're closing fast!
In a few minutes, this area will be swarming with Navy ships. You've got to go!
Liberty Cruisers on an intercept course. Range: 10000m and closing. Projected intercept: 30 seconds.
Lambda 5 has been destroyed. We have to get out of here. Now!
Damn it! That was close! I think we managed to shake 'em.
Thank Walker. When he told me that Trent's name showed up on the Navy's most wanted list, I knew you were in trouble.

Dynamic.Part: He's wanted for murder, artefact smuggling, treason and the destruction of Freeport 7. Quite an impressive list, actually.
Look, I have to rendezvous with Walker near Detroit. Stay low for a while. I'll be in touch.

Subtitles.Static: Walker here! We'll take care of the battleship.
All hands: fire at will! I repeat: all hands fire at will!
The trade lane is clear! Juni, Trent: get out of here! King, go with them.
Code Red! I repeat: Code Red! This is the Battleship Unity! We are under attack and taking heavy casualties! In need of immediate assistance! All available units, please [static]
All hands: abandon ship! I repeat: all hands abandon– [static]
Approaching ships, this is a restricted area! Turn around at once!
Juni, is this you? I've heard the news about you on the secure channel! What is going on?
You're cleared to dock. I'll meet you on the deck.
Juni, get clear! The defence system will hold them off.
I'm picking up more incoming ships. Oh my – three cruisers! They're closing fast!
There's no time, they're almost on top of us. You've got the coordinates to the jump-gate. Go!
This is Lambda 1 to all fighter groups: move to intercept remaining fighters. Over.
Commander Zane: power down your engines and surrender now.
They're making a run for it. All fighter wings: break formation and pursue.
Bounty Hunters ships: cease fire! These two are under the protection of the Lane Hackers.
You leave us no choice – all ships, open fire!
We've got to get out of here. Everybody is looking for you. Uploading a waypoint to your Neural Net! Come with us!
The enemies of Liberty are our friends.
We're maintaining a base in the asteroid field nearby. The Navy isn't aware of its existence. It's the only safe place for you right now.
This is Delta Wing. We found them. Repeat: we found them.
Affirmative, Delta Wing! Ms Zane, Mr Trent, we've been expecting you. Our commander wants to have a word with you, Ms Zane. Please land immediately.
Alert! Unknown contacts are closing in fast! Launch all fighters!
Picking up at least four Rheinland heavy fighters. Man all turrets.
That's it, last one! Ms Zane, we can no longer protect you. Leave Liberty while there's still time. Good luck.
Repair units, redeploy to the fires on level 3 and 4. Engineering, we have structural integrity loss near the landing docks.
Commander Zane – you are outmanned and outgunned. Surrender and we will spare your life.
Target their engines. We need it intact.
Negative. Those two have a big bounty on their heads. Clear out, there's no bounty for Hackers.
What the– are you crazy! You'll pay for this!
Hand over the artefact and you will be spared.

Dynamic.Part: You might say that.

Subtitles.Static: It's complicated, Tobias. Seems like all of Liberty is after me!

Dynamic.Part: I don't think I have the credits for that.

Subtitles.Static: You won't be sorry with that one, let me tell you.

Dynamic.Part: You can trust Richard Winston Tobias to make you the best deal anywhere.

Subtitles.Static: I was wondering when you might come back.
Are you in some kind of trouble?
You might also say "I told you so"?
I didn't take the time to apprentice you so you could throw it all away on some fool scheme.
But you knew better. "The deal of a lifetime", you said. Remember? Eh?

Dynamic.Part: Now look at you. That your hunk of junk on the landing pad?

Subtitles.Static: Hmmm. I suppose you'll be wanting some new parts on that thing...
It's good to see you, boy.
So are you back now... for good?
I see. Well, the first thing to do is get rid of your ship. There's likely to be a description out on it.

Dynamic.Part: That'll make you a popular target for bounty hunters.
You'll be needing something that blends in better around here...
I want you to go and see the ship dealer on New London. I'll tell him you're coming.

Subtitles.Static: He'll have a ship for you.
For once, just do what I tell you, boy.
I've been putting some aside. You'll have enough. Come with me.
That's why I'm here. Count me in!

Dynamic.Part: Ugh, anything else?

Subtitles.Static: You mean you don't know where he is? He doesn't know where he is!

Dynamic.Part: Ouch!

Subtitles.Static: I just need more time before I commit.
I was wondering when you'd show.
That's the thing. The good doctor has disappeared.
No. Not like them. This one left a trail.
But I'm gonna need your help, Trent. Are you with me?
Good! What do you know about Xeno-Archeology?
Just let me do the talking and whatever you do, keep that artefact out of sight.

Dynamic.Part: I don't want a repeat performance of Manhattan.

Subtitles.Static: Very nice of you to see us on such short notice, Mr Vance.
We understand. We'd made it quite a while ago.
I'm just pleased the university put me in touch with you.

Dynamic.Part: Has she? Do you think she'd mind if we looked her up?

Subtitles.Static: Of course! Can you tell us where Doctor Sinclair is now?

Dynamic.Part: That's all right. We'll go to her!

Subtitles.Static: You've been very helpful, Mr Vance. Thank you.
We gotta move! Get whatever you need here on Cambridge and meet me in space. Don't take too long... Doctor!
Trent, do you have any idea how difficult it's been to find this guy?
Typical! Look, Trent, you need more time? Take it!
Take all the time you need. I may still be here when you get back.
Still the hotbed of social activity! I hope you're here to work!
I was just about to hit up my contact for information about Quintaine, but now that you're here we can do it together?
When you said in your message that you and Doctor Trent were from the Hammer Research Institute in Liberty,
It's not entirely unusual for Doctor Quintaine to miss an appointment now and then – even one regarding funding.
I do a lot of work for Doctor Quintaine – shuttling people and equipment back and forth to his research sites.

Dynamic.Part: I'm sorry, usually I can find him, but...

Subtitles.Static: Oh, he hasn't been around for weeks. Probably doing deep research! He doesn't always tell us.

Dynamic.Part: Doctor Sinclair doesn't even know where he is.
Have you spoken to her yet?

Subtitles.Static: Well, there's your answer then. She knows just as much about their work as Quintaine, maybe even more.
She's been doing field work for the Professor for years.
No. Funding is what these scientists live for. Well, that and a... little recognition, of course.

Dynamic.Part: Sprague in Tau-29! I'm afraid I can't get her a message, though. It's too far out.

Subtitles.Static: Ah, I think Doctor Sinclair will be quite pleased. Last week, nothing.
This week, you and the Rheinlanders.
From the New Berlin Museum. They're also very interested in their work. You just missed them.
Rheinland ships! Where did they come from?

Dynamic.Part: Those ships came out of nowhere! Looked like some kind of cloaking technology. Not even the Liberty Navy has ever managed to get those to work!
The dig site isn't on any of the charts. We'll have to search for it.
Let's hope it's still there and that these Rheinlanders didn't find it already.
I'm getting a faint signal.
It must be the dig site. Hold on...
Yes, I think that's it! Looks like they had to excavate inside this rock formation to get to the dig site!
Activating landing sequence.
This must be the entrance – I'm going in.
No lights. No radio contact... this doesn't feel right.
Let's hope for the best! Maybe they're all digging for artefacts and don't even know we're coming.
Do you think we are too late?
We have to find Sinclair and get the hell out of here!
And you say you got this where, exactly?
A thief... in Manhattan. He was killed because of it. Now the same people are after us. We were told you could help.
Look around you, Miss Zane. You are standing in the living history of the Daam-K'Vosh. A race that predates early man by over 10 million years!
Up until recently, relatively speaking, they were the inhabitants of much of our new home here in Sirius.
I've been working for years to piece together fragments of their past: their culture, technology, language – anything! These panels here have been the core of my research.
They've shed light on some of their writings, but thanks to this piece, I'm close to unlocking their code.
Yes, I know quite a lot about this artefact, but not why anyone would want to kill for it.
Know anything about cloaking Rheinland ships?
Mr Trent, I am a scientist. I deal in facts, not fiction.
Well you better listed to the facts. A lot of people have died because of this trinket.
There's something going on in the colonies. People are being killed. Others have disappeared, like your colleague, Doctor Quintaine.
Quintaine hasn't disappeared – he's a recluse.
He's gone under, that's what I think. And a man like him only goes under for a very good reason. I think he knew too much.
This is ridiculous!
Is it? We find out that Rheinland has an active interest in your research and when we get here, we're attacked by Rheinland ships using a technology I have never seen before.
Still not enough of a connection for you? How about that friends of mine – trusted people in the Liberty military assigned to stop illegal artefact smuggling are gone-
like they were never there!
Maybe they knew too much, too. They just didn't see it coming like Quintaine. Well, I do, and you should, too.
And with him gone, that only leaves you!

I figure those ships are coming back here soon and there's no telling what else they're bringing with them. You, Doctor, can either be a live scientist on the run or a dead one in the ground! Which will it be?
I'm not leaving without my work! Besides, how do I know you aren't the enemy?
Doctor, we've got over a dozen ships on our screen. I don't know what kind. We didn't see them coming.
I told you they were coming back!
Pack up what you can and send the others to the ships!
Yes, Doctor.
All right, I'm with you!
Come on, we've got to go!
Doctor, the panels have been loaded into Mr Trent's hold.
Good! Get clear while you can.
They'll tear this place apart!
Come on!
This is gonna be close...!
Never mind that! We're outnumbered! We've got to get out of here!

Subtitles.Static: Jesus! They blew up the Docking Ring!
Oh my– they destroyed our base! My work!
I think we've managed to shake them for now.
To tell you the truth, I don't even pay attention any more.
To Leeds! I have a friend there. Come on!
We've got to get out of here!
Do you ever get tired of this?
It's a view like this that got me into Xeno-Archeology in the first place. I thought,

Dynamic.Part: if the universe exists for eons,
but I could only experience it for a brief moment of time, I wondered what a more ancient race must have thought of it?

Subtitles.Static: I wanted to live through them.
If you're right and Quintaine has hidden himself, that means he's still out there somewhere.
We can't outrun them this time. Trent, engage!
Damn it! They found us! Trent, engage.
Why are you telling us this?
Stop! Do not open fire! We mean you no harm. We're here to warn you.

Dynamic.Part: Because we have deserted from Rheinland! Our squadron opened fire on us after we disobeyed orders to destroy a civilian transport. We had no choice but to flee.
The Rheinland Military is watching all exits out of this system. You have an artefact they want, and they know that you're here in Cambridge.
Survival. We need you as much as you need us. We're heading to a jump-hole that will take us directly to Leeds.
It will be watched, but they aren't guarding it well because very few people know about it. Together, we might be able to fight our way through.

Subtitles.Static: Commander Zane, Mr Trent, we've been looking for you. Hand over the artefact and we will spare your life.
Have it your way! All fighter wings, engage. Target their engines–
It's a trap! Incoming torpedoes, evasive manoeuvres!
We're hit! All hands, abandon ship. Repeat–
Trent! This is Juni. I finally found a lead that might help us find Professor Quintaine. Meet me on Cambridge. I'll be waiting for you in the bar.
Took you long enough! We don't have any time to waste. Let's go.
These Rheinlanders could have left hours ago. We have to get to Sinclair before they do.
I checked the star chart. Sprague is a remote planet in the Omega-3 system. It's not too far from here.
Maybe this Doctor Sinclair is all we need to find out more about our artefact.
Roger, Norfolk! Our destination is Sprague in Omega-3. We have no intention to enter Rheinland territory.
Hold on, we'll take this trade lane. You lead, Trent.

Dynamic.Part: This entire conflict with Rheinland is about the damn alien artefacts.
Did you hear that President Jacobi is now trying to persuade the Queen to ban all artefacts here in Bretonia? I'm sure she has her reasons...

Subtitles.Static: There's the jump-gate. You first, Trent.
The star chart describes Sprague as an unpopulated planet with no trade lane connections. We'll have to fly from here to Freeport 1 and then through open space.
This is where we have to leave the trade lane.
Freeport 1, we're on our way to Sprague to bring supplies to an archaeological expedition. Have you detected any Rheinland ships in the area?
Trent, I've uploaded the coordinates to Sprague into your Neural Net. Come on.
The situation is really getting out of control now. A blockade in Omega-7? Rheinland is now in direct violation of the Boorman Treaty.
The colonies haven't been this close to an open military conflict since the 80-Year War between Rheinland and the GMG.
Vance gave me the frequency of the dig site beacon. I'm not picking up a signal yet – we probably have to get closer.
We made it! You dock first, Trent.
We have to head down to the planet and get Sinclair the hell out of here. I hope we're not too late! You first, Trent!
We have to hurry! I have a bad feeling that there are more of them out there somewhere.
Those ships came out of nowhere! Looked like some kind of cloaking technology. Not even the Liberty Navy has ever managed to get those to work!
Just a few more seconds! We'll lose them in the nebula!
We made it! Hold on, checking radar. Clear! No sign of them.

Dynamic.Part: Radar is clear, nice fighting! But I'm sure they'll be more. We have to get to Trent's friend in Leeds. I'm sure the jump-gate is being watched.
Sinclair, what's your status? Any ideas how to get out of here?
Doctor, ever since Trent came in possession of the artefact, we've been hunted: first by the Liberty Navy, then bounty hunters, now Rheinlanders.
Everybody seems to be after it – and we don't even know what it is. A friend told us that Professor Quintaine might be able to shed some light on this.

Subtitles.Static: His lab was destroyed. The only lead we could find was your pilot Vance. He told us where to find you.
We need to know what's going on with this artefact. Why everyone is after it.
Damn! I guess the best thing we can do is to fly to Leeds and regroup.
Trent, take the lead. Head for the new coordinates.
Damn it. The jump-hole is blocked by a battleship! What are we gonna do?
We made it! Thank you for your help.
The trade lane to Leeds is near. We should go.
An old friend of Trent's. This will be interesting...
Take the trade lane. We're almost there.
Don't mention it. Land on Leeds, we'll meet in the Equipment Room.

Dynamic.Part: Incoming ships, this is the Norfolk. Your trajectory indicates that you are travelling to the Omega systems.
Be advised that tensions between the Bretonian Empire and Rheinland have escalated. A military confrontation cannot be ruled out.

Subtitles.Static: Understood! We have no reports of Rheinland activity in that system. Norfolk out.

Dynamic.Part: Incoming ships! Be advised: Rheinland forces have set up blockades in Omega-7.
No ships are allowed access to Rheinland space. All merchant vessels are to remain at Freeport 1 until the crisis is over.

Subtitles.Static: Negative. But Sprague lies beyond our patrol routes – if you are attacked, we won't be able to send help.
Into the nebula! There's a place we can hide, I'm uploading the coordinates!
Baxter Research Station. It's been abandoned for over a decade, but life support should still be functioning.
You weren't joking when you told me about ships appearing out of nowhere! Thank you for getting me out of there!
This is it. We should land here. Keep your eyes open. They can't be that far off.
I'm okay. There's a jump-hole to Cambridge nearby. That's our best shot. From there, it should be easy to get to Leeds.
So, tell me, why did you come here? Surely not just to return the artefact to me?

Dynamic.Part: No idea. I found it on planet Pygar and knew immediately that it was of great archaeological significance.
I was scheduled to fly to Cambridge to get Professor Quintaine's expert opinion... but then the artefact was stolen and I didn't even go to Cambridge. I actually haven't seen the professor in years.

Subtitles.Static: We have to head to New London and from there to Leeds. I doubt the Rheinlanders will look for us here, but we need to stay sharp.
Who are we meeting on Leeds?
I can't believe we made it through all of this. Thank you.
Follow us! We're uploading the coordinates.

Dynamic.Part: Our wing was outfitted with cloaking devices – strange looking things, they're part of a secret Rheinland weapons program.
We'll cloak ourselves before we reach the jump-hole. They will think that you're an easy target, but we'll give them a little surprise.

Subtitles.Static: We'll take care of the battleship. Maintain radio silence.
We have to destroy the remaining fighters! Break and attack!
That was it! Let's get out of here. Mr Trent, you go first.

Dynamic.Part: You're welcome... but this isn't the end of it. Something has happened in Rheinland and I'm afraid the worst is yet to come.
We'll fly to the Norfolk and give ourselves up. Hopefully, someone in the Bretonia military will believe our story. Good luck to you.
Juni, meet Tobias.

Subtitles.Static: Tobias, sort of... uh, raised me.
Tobias, we need a safe place to lay low for a while.
I knew you were going to say that.
And from such humble beginnings... your head grew to its present size?
Doctor, can you decipher the writing on the artefact?
Like it or not, Trent. If we're gonna get some answers, I think we'll have to find Quintaine.
Look, this may take some time.
Sinclair will do everything she can on her work and I will dig around for any leads on Quintaine.
You try to scare up some business, we could probably use the credits.
Anyway, I can't have you lounge around here like a big ox waiting for things to happen.
[gasp] Trent, where have you been? I've been worried about you!
But I see you've been in good company!

Dynamic.Part: Richard Winston Tobias, Squire, dear Lady.

Subtitles.Static: And who do we have here? Another girl?

Dynamic.Part: [laughs]
Tell me, boy, what have you been doing?

Subtitles.Static: I can't remember when I ever saw such a vision of loveliness.
We're all clear! Nobody followed us.
I can do most of it, but not alone. I need Quintaine.
I'm looking for a guy named Dexter Hovis. Have you seen him?

Dynamic.Part: I'm a friend of Quintaine's. I understand you do some work for him every now and then. I've got a message for him.

Subtitles.Static: No way! I didn't come here to race. I came here for information.

Dynamic.Part: You know, I'd love to spend all day jawing with you, Bretonian, but I really only talk to racers.

Subtitles.Static: Unless of course, you are a racer and you're looking for a challenge... say, me, perhaps.
In that case, I'll talk to you all day – providing, of course, you live.
You see I have a hard time finding people who'll race against me. What do you say, tenderfoot?
Well, I don't do information lessen you win. And you can't win lessen you race.
If that doesn't suit you then maybe you should leave!
My deal hasn't changed, Bretonian. Race me and I'll tell you what you want to know.
Or get the hell off my ship.
I'll tell you about the Queen's secret hideaway, if you like... all you have to do is win.
We have a challenger! His name is Trent – against our very own Dexter Hovis! Place your bets! Make it quick!
Not a chance. I said I'd race you. Here I am!
I was beginning to think you were scared!
Eh, eh... I like your attitude, Bretonian. It'll be a shame to see you burn! But hey, that's the price of sportsmanship.
We'll see soon enough, won't we?

Dynamic.Part: 'course, I don't; you hunk o' junk. I built this damn thing, but its memory banks are busted.
Simple rules, Bretonian: one round, no shooting or bumping – and if you stink it up or chicken out on the course, you'll make me angry! And you don't want that! You ready?

Subtitles.Static: Welcome, racers! You have selected a one-lap race. Do you need a review of the regulations?
Hovis did it again! The challenger never had a chance!
You lose kid! Normally, I don't do this, but I'll give you another chance to prove yourself. Get back to that start point.
Now tell me about Quintaine. Is he here?
Naturally. Now, how do I get there?
A fine race, Bretonian! I haven't felt a challenge in years.
He contacted me to take him even further into the asteroid field to an abandoned mining station called The Glorious.
He's holed up with the pirates that took it over.
He said he needed to disappear for a while.
But, naturally, you didn't hear any of this from me.
Take the old trade lane into the asteroid field, but be careful:
the lane isn't stable – sometimes the asteroids can get through.
And watch out for a group of Rheinlanders that was headed that way. They didn't look too friendly.
Hey, Bretonian. If it don't work out, you know you can always come back and race with us!

Dynamic.Part: The name's Trent. Doctor Sinclair sent me to find you.
I already told you.
But I fought them, too!

Subtitles.Static: Wait, wait! I have the Daam K'Vosh artefact.

Dynamic.Part: I have your artefact. The one Sinclair lost on Pygar, I've found it. That's why I came.

Subtitles.Static: Sinclair is working on it back on Leeds, in hiding. But she can't decipher it on her own. She needs your help.

Dynamic.Part: What's that?
Whoa! Easy with that!

Subtitles.Static: You fought well out there. C'mon. Someone wants to have a look at you.

Dynamic.Part: I find that hard to believe since she has no idea where I am. Now, who sent you?
Enough!
You do understand that with the appearance of our Rheinland friends, I'm hesitant to take too many chances.

Subtitles.Static: Yes, and I wanted to thank you for your help. Push him out of the airlock!

Dynamic.Part: What did you say?

Subtitles.Static: [sigh] I don't suspect you have it with you, no, that would be too easy.
Very well, Mr Trent! I will go back with you, but on one condition.

Dynamic.Part: Trent, I have news. Doctor Sinclair has made good progress in analysing the artefact. But she's now reached a point where she can't continue without the help of Quintaine.
Our best lead is a pilot Quintaine sometimes works with, a guy named Dexter Hovis. He's running a gambling operation on an abandoned battleship in the Dublin system. You should start there.

Subtitles.Static: What are you trying to do?!? Get back to the starting gate NOW!
You've fallen so far behind that you'll never catch up.
Come on! I want a challenge!
Damn! Give him something to think about, boys!
Ha! My grandma is faster than you, Bretonian!
Okay, I'll tell you want you want to know – but not over the comm channel. Meet me on the deck of the Hood.
Stop attacking or the deal is off!
Negative! Leave the area at once!
Jarvis, Foshko: take out the gunship. Sanchez, Barrera: engage the fighters.
All of our fighters have been destroyed. We need assistance!
Thanks for your help, stranger. You're cleared to land.
One of their fighters is down!
There's only one of their fighters left!
Mr Trent! Quintaine here. I'm flying this armoured transport. I know it's slow, but it contains all the equipment I need for my work.
So Sinclair wants to meet on Leeds? That blight on our culture? All right.
I'm hit! My cruise engines are down!
I actually haven't seen Doctor Sinclair in years. She sent me a message a while back that she had made a discovery on Pygar. Finally, a Daam-K'Vosh artefact that's still active!
I can't wait to see it.
We should be safe now. Let's get back on solid ground.
I'll meet you down on the planet, Mr Trent. You go first.
My cruise engines are back on-line. We have to get out of here.
Mr Trent, you dock first and we'll follow you through.
Albertson, turn around. See you later.
This is your last warning. Surrender Quintaine, or you will be destroyed.
As you wish. Destroy the station. Make sure there aren't any survivors.
Hovis is the leader after the first quarter of the course!
Trent leads after the first quarter!
Hovis has taked in the lead.
The newcomer is making early big for payback in this race.
Hovis is in front of the half-way mark!
