I know I can do a better job for you now. Have anything?
It's some sort of scam? Not going for it.
No. You want too much. Thanks anyway.
That's way too expensive. Thanks anyway.
I'm not really thristy, thanks. Anything else?
No, I'm sorry. It's too rich for my blood.
Thanks anyway. That's more than I wanted to spend.
Good to be seen. Anything going on?
Good to be back. So, tell me what you got?
I can make it up to you if you give me another chance.
Yeah. Sorry about that. Can you give me something now?
Another time. Right now I like to know what's going on here.
Nothing now. But I'll bet you can give me some information.
No, thanks. I'm not really interested.
Thanks for the heads up. Never know.
Could be useful later. Thank you.
I'll keep that in mind. Thank you.
Thanks a lot. Any action going on?
So, what's up now that I'm here?
Wondering if we can do a little business.
I'm looking to see what you have to offer.
Like to take my own time.
I thought I take another look around.
That's not what I had in mind. Thanks anyway.
Not for me. Better find someone else.
No, thanks. Not really what I'm looking for.
You too. Have anything I can use?
Good to be seen. Have anything new?
I'm just not done looking around.
I wanted to take another look around.
Thanks. You have anything for me?
What do you have for me?
I think I'm staying away for this one.
Thanks a lot. Have anything good?
I know you've got something else.
I can really be all you have.
You have anything else for me?
In my line it pays to be persistent.
Think you have anything else for me?
I thought I'd see what else you had to offer.
You have anything else for me?
I know I can do a better job for you now. Have anything?
Thanks a lot. Have anything good?
Thanks a lot. Any action going on?
I thought I'd see what else you had to offer.
I wanted to take another look around.
Wondering if we can do a little business.
Thought I'd see if you had anything I need.
I'm looking for something you may have.
I'm looking to see what you have to offer.
I'm just checking things out right now.
So tell me, what's it all about?
That's not what I had in mind. Thanks anyway.
That's way too expensive. Thanks anyway.
At least give me a chance to make it up to you. Please.
You try to cheat me? Not interested.
Maybe if it were cheaper. It's not worth it.
I'm not really looking for a drink. Have anything else?
What I need is some info. You got anything?
No, thank you. Gona have to do better than that.
Back to the source. So, what do you have?
I did what I did. You have a need, I need a job.
Ey, it happens. Can you give me another chance?
I'm not thirsty. Actually I've heard you're a man who knows things.
I'm not thirsty. But, crew me into what's going on here.
No, thanks. But I'll bet you know what's going on around here.
Every little bit helps. Thanks you.
That may come in handy. Thank you.
Yeah. Great. Have anything for me?
Thanks. You have anything for me?
No, thanks. Not really what I'm looking for.
Thanks anyway. That's more than I wanted to spend.
I'm not really looking for a drink. Have anything else?
I think I'm staying away for this one.
No, thanks. I'm not really interested.
I'm not thirsty. Actually I've heard you're a man who knows things.
I'm not quite ready to leave just yet.
No dice. Sorry. I'm not interested.
Sometimes find a deal takes time.
You too. Have anything I can use?
Good to be seen. Have anything new?
Good to be seen. Anything going on?
Trent! We have to go faster!
Why are we going so slow? Trent, give more power to the engines!
Trent, you're not going anywhere. Hold on, I'm coming back.
Trent, your heading slightly off. Follow me.
We're making good progress. Let's keep it up.
I've done all I can. See you later.

Trent, you need to dock with the trade lane.
Trent, dock with the trade lane to proceed.

You're getting too far away. Come back!

I'm glad you are here, Trent.

You look like you're slightly off course. Trent, follow me.
Everything is looking good. You're right on course.
Trent, I'm tired of this. This mission is over. See you later.
Trent, you're heading away from our destination. Turn around.
Trent, you have to stay closer. I'm reducing speed. Come on.
Trent, you are here. Let's get going.

Trent! We have to go faster!
Join my formation and let's get going.
It's time to go, Trent. Join my formation.
Use the dock maneuver to dock with the base.
